  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Appender, Filterable, LifeCycle

    @Plugin(name="JLineConsole",
        category="Core",
        elementType="appender",
        printObject=true)
public class JLineConsoleAppender
extends AbstractOutputStreamAppender
